name: Hewynn
description: A tender Fairy who is skilled at continuous healing.

ultimate.name: Rain Prayer
ultimate.description: Hewynn heals all allies for 95% of her ATK as HP. Effect lasts for 9s.

upgrades.upgrade: Healing amount per second is increased to 100% HP.
Healing amount per second is increased to 105% HP.
Healing amount per second is increased to 110% HP.
Healing amount per second is increased to 115% HP.

skill_1.name: Wound Healing
skill_1.description: Restores 280% of her ATK as HP for 1 weakest ally.

upgrades.upgrade: Healing Amount is increased to 290% HP.
Healing Amount is increased to 300% HP.
Hewynn's skill grants this effect once every 3s to 1 weakest ally while casting her Ultimate.

skill_2.name: Revitalize
skill_2.description: When the current HP ratio of an ally is below 50%, Hewynn grants them a healing bonus of 120% of her ATK. This effect applies to each ally once every 8s.

upgrades.upgrade: Hewynn heals an ally and removes all their dispellable debuffs. The effect can be triggered once for each ally every 6s.
The extra healing takes effect to each ally once every 6s, and the dispelling effect to each ally once every 4s.
The extra healing amount is increased to 130%.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Hewynn increases her ATK by 9% during battle. She gains an extra 6% ATK after casting her Ultimate for the first time.

upgrades.upgrade: Hewynn increases her ATK by 12% during battle. She gains an extra 8% ATK after casting her Ultimate for the first time.
Hewynn increases her ATK by 14% during battle. She gains an extra 10% ATK after casting her Ultimate for the first time.

ex_skill.name: Tranquility
ex_skill.description: Hewynn is unaffected for 6s. While casting Rain Prayer, all allies take 30% less damage.

upgrades.upgrade: Hewynn has 300 initial energy. All her allies' damage taken is decreased by 32% when the Rain Prayer takes effect.
When Rain Prayer takes effect, Hewynn's healing grants a buff from Revitalize, and all her allies' damage taken is reduced by 34%.
The allies' damage taken is decreased by 36% when the Rain Prayer takes effect.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Hewynn also grants the healed ally 30 Haste for 6s when Revitalize is in effect.

season_skill.name: Soul-lifting Touch
season_skill.description: Every 5s, increases the ATK by 13% and Haste by 11 for 3s for the ally who has dealt the most damage and has a HP ratio above 75%.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases ATK bonus by 14% and Haste bonus by 12.
Increases ATK bonus by 15% and Haste bonus by 13.
Increases ATK bonus by 16% and Haste bonus by 14.
Increases ATK bonus by 17% and Haste bonus by 15.
Increases ATK bonus by 18% and Haste bonus by 16.
Increases ATK bonus by 19% and Haste bonus by 17.
Increases ATK bonus by 20% and Haste bonus by 18.
